flawed_nl_solution:
She can buy 7 bags of candy because 7 / 1 = <<7/1=7>>7
She can buy 5 bags of chips because 7 / 1.4 = <<7/1.4=5>>5.
She gets 84 ounces of candy because 7 x 12 = <<7*12=84>>84
She gets 58 ounces of chips because 5 x 17 = <<5*17=58>>58
The gets 84 ounces in food because 58 > 84
#### 84

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 85, not 58. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
